QuestData.Title: Succumbing to Pride
QuestData.Description:
The aspirants that spend the most time at this temple are those who must face their pride.
I was one of them, once.
During our surveillance, I saw Forsworn forcing these aspirants to fall to their vices then toss them aside as if they meant nothing.
You must stop the Forsworn. Free the aspirants from a terrible fate.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free $1oa Burdened Aspirants by stopping Forsworn rituals.
